ack.title: ACKNOWLEDGEMENTS
ack.p: We thank Marcela de Matos Barbosa, Dirk Koedam, Jânio Ângelo Félix, Ulyses Madureira Maia, and Márcia Rêgo for help with the collection of specimens. R Jaffé was supported by a research grant from CNPq (478982/2013‐5), JC Veiga by a CAPES/EMBRAPA PhD scholarship (15/2014), NS Pope by an NSF predoctoral fellowship, CS Carvalho by a CAPES postdoctoral fellowship (88887.156652/2017‐00), and ECM Lanes by a CNPq postdoctoral fellowship (300714/2017‐3). R Jaffé, BM Freitas, CF Martins, MC Arias, and VL Imperatriz‐Fonseca received CNPq productivity research fellowship (301616/2017‐5, 305126/2013‐0, 302976/2015‐9, 306932/2016‐4, and 311531/2014‐8, respectively). Funding was also provided by the Research Center on Biodiversity and Computing (BioComp) from the University of São Paulo, Empresa Brasileira de Pesquisa Agropecuária (02.11.01.029.00.00), and Instituto Tecnológico Vale.
